decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the Omniscience Combo, which allows the player to play spells for free. Utilizing cards like Marang River Regent and Fallaji Archaeologist to generate tokens and Moment of Truth to draw cards, the deck aims to control the board with spells like Ephara's Dispersal and stock up on resources with Abuelo's Awakening. With cards like Roiling Dragonstorm and Temporary Lockdown to disrupt the opponent, the deck seeks to establish a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells.
